dmca.title: Report of Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sally and Virginia [mailto:tutorme@speak-read-write.com] 
Sent: Sunday, March 04, 2007 7:21 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Report of Copyright Violation

Hi,
I own and run a website for English as a Second Language learning at 
www.speak-read-write.com. I have copyright statements on all the pages 
of my site.

A site you serve, www.teslcafe.com has stolen a page of my site and 
republished it without permission or credit.

We have blocked their link to my mp3 (a reading of the page) in our 
.htaccess file today.

Their page posting the material they stole from me is 
http://www.teslcafe.com/node/44

My page showing this material as mine is 
http://www.speak-read-write.com/sympathy.html

Thanks for doing whatever you can about this.

Sally Jennings
www.speak-read-write.com
